root.name: Avination
root.description: Avination is a online virtual world service based on Opensimulator open source technology and is free to play. Avination offers "regions" which are essentially "sandboxes" that one can create there own simulations for a nominal monthly fee. Avination has a in game building tools, an economy to allow buying and selling of creations, a scripting system to enable object motion and interaction, as well as a built in physics engine. Avination also supports Collida Mesh imports so that you can create content with third party 3D applications like Blender and Goggle Sketchup.
